description.en:
1) Kouzuki picks up the beaten young man from the street and takes him in. They start a sexual relationship and begin living together. Can emotionless Kouzuki learn to trust this mysterious guy?

2) 100 years ago a knight attacked the dragon king and he slept for 100 years. Later he awakens and requests that the current prince and the prince's knight come to his castle in exchange for the peace of their nation
though were the dragon king and the knight really enemies?

3) Hiroaki has long harbored feelings for his older brother Yatsutaka who is aware of the fact that "he likes guys".

4) A man watches the world from above and sends a servant down to solve any problems that may arise.
